title: Karthikeya 2
overview: Before the Kalyug begins, Lord Krishna hands over an anklet that holds the answer to all of worldâ€™s miseries. Years later a doctor finds himself in the thick of things when the pursuit for the anklet carries on. A doctor with a curious mind, Karthikeya, aka Karthik, believes in pursuing the truth. The quest leads Karthik to discover the power of the ancient Indian belief system and the essence of Krishna.
